record.field: VAT on Sales and all other Ouputs

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '1_STANDARD_RATED_SUPPLIES_CUSTOM.base + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.base + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.base + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '1_STANDARD_RATED_SUPPLIES_CUSTOM.tax + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.tax + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.tax + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.tax'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'a. Abu Dhabi (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'a. Abu Dhabi (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'b. Dubai (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'b. Dubai (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'c. Sharjah (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'c. Sharjah (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'd. Ajman (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'd. Ajman (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'e. Umm Al Quwain (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'e. Umm Al Quwain (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'f. Ras Al-Khaima (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'f. Ras Al-Khaima (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'g. Fujairah (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'g. Fujairah (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.tax'})]

record.field: 2. Tax Refunds provided to Tourists under the Tax Refunds for Tourists Scheme

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '2. Tax Refunds provided to Tourists under the Tax Refunds for Tourists Scheme (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '2. Tax Refunds provided to Tourists under the Tax Refunds for Tourists Scheme (Tax)'})]

record.field: 3. Supplies subject to reverse charge provisions

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '3. Supplies subject to reverse charge provisions (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '3. Supplies subject to reverse charge provisions (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '4. Zero rated supplies (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '4. Zero rated supplies (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '5. Exempt supplies (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '5. Exempt supplies (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'sum'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'sum'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '7. Goods imported into the UAE (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '7. Goods imported into the UAE (Tax)'})]

record.field: 8. Adjustments to goods imported into the UAE

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'sum'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'sum'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.base + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.base + (STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.tax + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.tax + (STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.tax)'})]

record.field: VAT on Expenses and all other Inputs

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.base + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.tax + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.tax'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '10. Standard rated expenses (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '10. Standard rated expenses (Tax)'})]

record.field: 11. Supplies subject to the reverse charge provisions

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '11. Supplies subject to the reverse charge provisions (Base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': '11. Supplies subject to the reverse charge provisions (Tax)'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'sum'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'tax_tags', 'formula': 'sum'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.base + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.tax + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.tax'})]

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '((STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.base) + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.base + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.base) - (OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.base + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '((STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.tax) + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.tax + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.tax) - (OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.tax + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.tax)'})]

record.field: 14. Total value of due for the period

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '(STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.base) + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.base + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '(STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.tax) + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.tax + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.tax'})]

record.field: 15. Total value of recoverable for the period

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.base + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.base'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': 'OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.tax + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.tax'})]

record.field: 16. Net due (or reclaimed) for the period

field.name: expression_ids
field.eval: [Command.clear(), Command.create({'label': 'base', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '((STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.base + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.base) + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.base + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.base + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.base + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.base) - (OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.base + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.base + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.base)'}), Command.create({'label': 'tax', 'engine': 'aggregation', 'formula': '((STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_DB.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_SJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_AJ.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_UM.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_RA.tax + STD_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM_FU.tax) + OUT_OF_SCOPE_CUSTOM_0.tax + ADJUST_GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + GOODS_IMPORT_IN_UAE_CUSTOM.tax + EXAMPT_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + ZERO_RATE_SUPP_CUSTOM.tax + REVERSE_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + TAX_REF_TOUR_SCHEME_CUSTOM.tax) - (OUT_OF_SCOPE_1_CUSTOM.tax + SUPP_REV_CHARGE_PRO_CUSTOM.tax + STD_RATE_EXPENSES_CUSTOM.tax)'})]
